alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 18 at 5:45AM MST until May 19 at 10:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ TO 10 PM PDT /10 PM MST/ THURSDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWEST ARIZONA... The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ to 10 PM PDT /10 PM MST/ Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch for Friday has been cancelled. * TIMING...Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * WIND...Southwest to west winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity levels of 5 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
